sections.heading: intent.It is the intent of the Legislature that no General Funds be used in carrying out the Ground Emergency Medical Transport Act
sections.text: Revenue from the intergovernmental transfer program created under the Ground Emergency Medical Transport Act shall be deposited into the Health and Human Services Cash

68-979.Legislative intent.

It is the intent of the Legislature that no General Funds be used in carrying out the Ground Emergency Medical Transport Act.

Revenue from the intergovernmental transfer program created under the Ground Emergency Medical Transport Act shall be deposited into the Health and Human Services Cash Fund.

SourceLaws 2017, LB578, ยง 4.
